experience.title: Student at Gatton Academy
experience.content: At 16 I left home to attend the Gatton Academy, a 2 year residential STEM high school with some of the best and brightest minds in Kentucky. While there I did physics research, competed in the National Science Bowl, participated in robotics competitions, cryptography club (of which I founded), and gained over 90 college credit hours. I met Bill Nye, Michio Kaku, the head of NASA, and many other awesome people. I graduated in May 2015, but continue to keep in touch with the 60 members of my graduating class.
